Interface ImageDataAccess

All Known Implementing Classes:
PBMDataAccess, PGMDataAccess, PNGDataAccess, PNMDataAccess, PNMWithMaxValueDataAccess, PPMDataAccess
public interface ImageDataAccess
Interface defining the operations for accessing image data. Provides methods to read and write image files in the application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    WritableImage
    read(String path)
    Reads an image file from the specified path and processes it into a WritableImage.
    WritableImage
    write(WritableImage image)
    Writes a WritableImage to a file at the specified path.

  • Method Details

    • read

      WritableImage read(String path) throws IOException
      Reads an image file from the specified path and processes it into a WritableImage.
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the image file to read
      Returns:
      a WritableImage object representing the processed image
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

    • write

      WritableImage write(WritableImage image) throws IOException
      Writes a WritableImage to a file at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      image - the WritableImage object to be written to the file
      Returns:
      the WritableImage object that was written
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing the file
